channel.title: Looking for a Use-
channel.description:
Hey guys schitzo here,
Well i am currently looking for something to use a complimentary 1 year free premium hosting + Free .com domain on, I tried looking for a dev team but none of them have replied to my quarry's, so I am here to ask you what I should use it for- I don't want it to go to waste, and no I will not give it to anyone- If your reading this and you have a dev team going and want me to do web for you I will use it for your server with picture proof etc. that the project will be successful.
So yeah- if anyone has any ideas just reply back <3
Thanks ~Schitzo

item.title: Looking for a Use-
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“Schitzomniac, post:11, topic:431406”]thanks for all the flame

Oh and my primary language is English I just don’t take pride in spelling, and i don’t care about grammar etcetera when I don’t absolutely have to :D[/quote]

You should.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a Use-
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:9, topic:431406”][quote author=Daginith link=topic=534085.msg3904872#msg3904872 date=1328138934]

Good server + Good site = Sucess

Good site means good content, which means correct English, providing your primary language is English. Not trying to be an ass here but if you want to get anywhere in life then you need good spelling and grammar.
success*

On topic, why not just buy your own host (or even set up a home server, or even use a free host) and a domain, domain is only what, £20 a year?

Edit: Oh I misread the topic… Ignore the above.

^^Owned
tbh, i was laughing like five min. thx for the laugh bro.
[/quote]
You’re very easily pleased young one.[/quote]
Very. watching a Linux Kernel panic is like LSD to me. so. fkn. ammusing. XD

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a Use-
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

frozon566:

My name is Niall and I had nothing to say but I wanted to post so I became a grammar nazi.

quarry in place of query is just wrong, they don’t sound the same and are far from meaning the same thing

being a grammar nazi implies nitpicking over small things, I don’t think this is a minor mistake

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a Use-
item.dc:creator: @Schitzomniac Schitzomniac
item.description:
@Schitzomniac wrote:

[quote=“frozon566, post:4, topic:431406”]My name is Niall and I had nothing to say but I wanted to post so I became a grammar nazi.

@op, The Moparscape server status pages/rl/r-s are filled with retarded servers running there “websites” on an smf or some free hosting site with ads everywhere you could just pm them on there and you would probably have about a thousand 12 year old kids offering you “co-owner” for it.[/quote]

Yeah if you read ^.^ I said i wanted the project to be successful xD im 19 im not going to work with a bunch of 12 year olds -_- and im currently in web design and coding as a means of employment- i would prefer them to be 15+ and know java well- Good server + Good site = Sucess

Read full topic
